mapper.select: select studentId,password from t_student where studentName=#{value}
select studentId,password from t_student where email=#{value} or studentName=#{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_student SET studentAge= #{studentAge},phone = #{phone},preference = #{preference} WHERE studentId = #{studentId}
mapper.select: select t_discount.*,t_course.courseName,t_course.mainImage,t_teacher.teacherName,t_organization.organizationName from t_discount,t_course,t_teacher,t_organization where t_discount.studentId=#{studentId} and t_discount.courseId=t_course.courseId and t_course.teacherId=t_teacher.teacherId and t_teacher.organizationId=t_organization.organizationId
select t_discount.discountCode,t_course.courseName,t_course.discountUseInfo from t_discount,t_course where t_discount.discountId=#{discountId} and t_discount.courseId=t_course.courseId

select t_ordersCar.courseId,t_course.courseName,t_course.mainImage,t_teacher.teacherName,t_organization.organizationAddr,t_organization.organizationName from t_ordersCar ,t_course,t_teacher,t_organization where t_ordersCar.studentId=#{studentId} and t_ordersCar.courseId=t_course.courseId and t_course.teacherId=t_teacher.teacherId and t_teacher.organizationId=t_organization.organizationId

select t_orderscar.ordersCarId,t_orderscar.courseId,courseName,teacherName,organizationName from t_orderscar,t_course,t_teacher,t_organization where t_orderscar.studentId=#{studentId} and t_orderscar.courseId=t_course.courseId and t_course.teacherId=t_teacher.teacherId and t_teacher.organizationId=t_organization.organizationId

select t_discount.courseId,discountStatus,discountCode,t_course.courseName,t_teacher.teacherName, t_organization.organizationName from t_discount,t_course,t_teacher,t_organization where t_discount.studentId=#{studentId} and t_discount.courseId=t_course.courseId and t_course.teacherId=t_teacher.teacherId and t_teacher.organizationId=t_organization.organizationId

select c.*,t.teacherName,o.organizationName,ct.studentId from t_coursestudent ct ,t_course c ,t_organization o ,t_teacher t where ct.studentId = #{studentId} and ct.courseId = c.courseId and c.teacherId = t.teacherId and o.organizationId = t.organizationId
